featured.title: Personal Homelab & Infrastructure
featured.description: Comprehensive homelab setup featuring virtualization, containerization, and network management. Built using Proxmox for VM orchestration, Docker for containerized services, and pfSense for advanced network security and routing.
highlights: Proxmox-based virtualization cluster with high availability
pfSense firewall with VPN and intrusion detection

featured.title: Business Analytics Dashboard
featured.description: Full-stack web application for visualizing business metrics and KPIs. Features real-time data processing, interactive charts, and automated reporting capabilities using modern web technologies.
highlights: RESTful API with Node.js and Express
Automated report generation and email distribution

featured.title: Cloud Infrastructure Migration
featured.description: Led migration of legacy on-premises infrastructure to Google Cloud Platform. Implemented Infrastructure as Code, CI/CD pipelines, and monitoring solutions for improved scalability and reliability.
highlights: Cost optimization and security best practices

other.title: Predictive Analytics Engine
other.description: Machine learning system for forecasting business metrics and identifying trends. Implements multiple algorithms including regression, time series analysis, and ensemble methods for accurate predictions.
highlights: Multiple ML algorithms for different prediction scenarios
Feature engineering and automated model selection

other.title: Business Process Automation
other.description: Collection of automation scripts and tools for streamlining repetitive business tasks. Includes data extraction, report generation, and workflow automation using Python and various APIs.
highlights: Automated data extraction from multiple sources
Integration with business systems via APIs
